cust_name: 泳輝科技工程有限公司
job_detail:
因應大環境產業需求工種多樣，我們期望的員工是具備多元化技能，
不侷限於單一技術，我們徵求認真、負責、樂於學習的員工加入團隊，

如您符合以下其一工作經驗者，其他可輔導訓練:

※工作內容※

1.焊接西工：焊接管路與鋼構預製安裝及鋼構裁切。 

2.水電、製程配管：塑膠管、不銹鋼管配管(焊接)。

3.設備拆裝搬運: 無塵室或石化廠各項設備組立安裝、吊掛搬運。 

工作須爬高，須無懼高症。

※具以下條件者歡迎踴躍應徵※

1.具備審核施工圖面能力佳。
2.可接受外派出差者佳。
3.樂意學習新事物，不局限於單一工種者。


*案廠多為奇美實業與南部科學園區內
*需配合職務及區域調動

job_name: 台南安定區-科技廠保全員
cust_name: 英商_台灣士瑞克保全股份有限公司
job_detail:
1.負責門禁管制、安全檢查、出入貨品管制、車輛出入指揮、廠區巡邏、防竊作業等安全維護工作。
2.針對廠房處所進行監視,維持公共安全,減少火災、竊盜或其他危險。
3.監控廠區各項設備運作有無異常。
4.廠區安全維護管理、保障業主資產等安全。
兩班制:(AM0700~1900 ; PM1900~0700)，早班,晚班,需輪班,月休6~7天。

福利:
#享足額投保勞健保及勞工退休金提繳(不像很多公司都低保)
#員工團保(保障員工不論平假日的意外受傷導致的醫療費用)
#三節獎金、生日禮金(陪你一起過節過生日)
#年終獎金(視公司年度盈餘，與保全同仁一同分享)
#特休(依照勞基法的特休天數，保全人員做越久越多天)
#國定假日加班費(國定假日出勤者再給工資)
#福委會各項補助津貼(不論婚喪喜慶，福委都會為你獻上心意)
other:
具工作熱忱暨服務、有責任感，善解，包容，具同理心，處事圓融，會電腦基本操作。
依保全業法10-1規範,無相關刑事前科記錄/依職業安全衛生法第20條規範，在員工新進報到時需提供體檢報告

cust_name: 台灣積體電路製造股份有限公司(台積電)
job_detail:
【本職缺僅接受台積電官方網站投遞】 請至台積電官方網站投遞個人履歷表，此職缺履歷登錄網址:https://bit.ly/3p6uH8Q

Description
 
The Future is Bright, It's Here. Choose a career in creating the technologies that are changing the world.
TSMC is the world's first dedicated semiconductor foundry. As the founder and a leader of the Dedicated IC Foundry segment, TSMC has built its reputation by offering advanced and "More-than-Moore"​ wafer production processes and unparalleled manufacturing efficiency.

Nano Mask Technology Transfer Department (NMTT) has focused on the development and production of state-of-the-art EUV pellicles, which are ultrathin membranes used to protect the photomask from contamination during EUV exposure.
Our ambition is to produce the world's No.1 EUV pellicle with high transmittance and excellent durability. Our mission is to maintain TSMC’s leading role in the advanced foundry market through excellent yield with the help of EUV pellicles. By virtue of particle-free on photomask during EUV exposure in the scanner, mass production of chips with high throughput and high quality can be then realized. Most importantly, green manufacturing can also be strived for due to the significant reduction of pollution, energy, and raw materials. 
   
We are now looking for a process engineer. As part of our EUV pellicle team, we not only do research and development of ultrathin film processes but also make ideas real. This role offers an excellent opportunity to expand your career by means of cooperating with multi-disciplinary team members and empowering the world's most successful companies.

Task of the role
1. EUV pellicle process engineer.
2. Continue improvement in EUV pellicle quality & throughput.
3. Design of experiment (DOE) verification
Your will learn
1. Multidisciplinary collaboration in engineering, including cutting-edge materials, optics, physics, and mechanics.
2. Communication skills with interdepartmental personnel.
3. Expanding horizons of science, technology, and innovation.
 

Qualifications
 
What We Need
1.Master’s degree/PhD, or equivalent experience in science and engineering-related fields.
2.TOEIC score of 600 or above

Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd
1.Good problem-solving and communication skills, team spirit, and an active learner.
2.Work experience and expertise in PVD/CVD.
2.Work experience and expertise in lithography.

We have some of the most forward-thinking and hard-working people in the world working with us. If you're creative and autonomous, we want to hear from you!
NMTT is committed to fostering a diverse work environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We highly value diversity in our current and future employees.
major: 材料工程相關 物理學相關
